languages.text: {n}Фыркнув, Ульфар презрительно сплевывает.{/n} "Ради утоления голода я бы скорее глодал камни, чем мясо этих хилых вырожденцев, ничтожных прихвостней лжебогов, богохульных мешков скверны и трусости..." {n}Ворчание воина переходит в бранную тираду на фенрисийском.{/n}

{n}Ulfar snorts contemptuously and spits on the ground.{/n} "If I wanted to sate my hunger, I would sooner swallow rocks than the meat of these lousy degenerates, these pathetic minions of the false gods, these heretical sacks of corruption and cowardice..." {n}Ulfar's rumbling rises to a profanity-filled tirade in Fenrisian.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Фыркнув, Ульфар презрительно сплевывает.{/n} "Ради утоления голода я бы скорее глодал камни, чем мясо этих хилых вырожденцев, ничтожных прихвостней лжебогов, богохульных мешков скверны и трусости..." {n}Ворчание воина переходит в бранную тираду на фенрисийском.{/n}

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法轻蔑地哼了一声，朝地上吐了口口水。{/n}“如果我真的只想填饱肚子，那我宁可吃石头，也不想吃这些堕落之人肮脏的血肉。他们不过是伪神可悲的爪牙，这些堕落而又懦弱的异端混蛋……”{n}乌尔法的声音变得越来越响，到最后甚至用芬里斯语骂了起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar snorts contemptuously and spits on the ground.{/n} "If I wanted to sate my hunger, I would sooner swallow rocks than the meat of these lousy degenerates, these pathetic minions of the false gods, these heretical sacks of corruption and cowardice..." {n}Ulfar's rumbling rises to a profanity-filled tirade in Fenrisian.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法轻蔑地哼了一声，朝地上吐了口口水。{/n}“如果我真的只想填饱肚子，那我宁可吃石头，也不想吃这些堕落之人肮脏的血肉。他们不过是伪神可悲的爪牙，这些堕落而又懦弱的异端混蛋……”{n}乌尔法的声音变得越来越响，到最后甚至用芬里斯语骂了起来。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar resopla con desdén y escupe al suelo.{/n} «Si quisiera saciar mi hambre, antes tragaría rocas que la carne de esos degenerados, esos patéticos sirvientes de falsos dioses, esos herejes corruptos y cobardes...». {n}Las palabras de Ulfar dan paso a una diatriba llena de insultos en fenrisiano.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar snorts contemptuously and spits on the ground.{/n} "If I wanted to sate my hunger, I would sooner swallow rocks than the meat of these lousy degenerates, these pathetic minions of the false gods, these heretical sacks of corruption and cowardice..." {n}Ulfar's rumbling rises to a profanity-filled tirade in Fenrisian.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar resopla con desdén y escupe al suelo.{/n} «Si quisiera saciar mi hambre, antes tragaría rocas que la carne de esos degenerados, esos patéticos sirvientes de falsos dioses, esos herejes corruptos y cobardes...». {n}Las palabras de Ulfar dan paso a una diatriba llena de insultos en fenrisiano.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは軽蔑したように鼻を鳴らし、地面に唾を吐いた。{/n}「空腹を満たすためなら、こんな最低の堕落者、偽の神々の哀れな手先、腐敗と臆病の異端者どもの肉より、石を飲み込んだ方がましだ…」{n}ウルファーは、フェンリスの言葉で冒涜的な暴言を吐く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar snorts contemptuously and spits on the ground.{/n} "If I wanted to sate my hunger, I would sooner swallow rocks than the meat of these lousy degenerates, these pathetic minions of the false gods, these heretical sacks of corruption and cowardice..." {n}Ulfar's rumbling rises to a profanity-filled tirade in Fenrisian.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは軽蔑したように鼻を鳴らし、地面に唾を吐いた。{/n}「空腹を満たすためなら、こんな最低の堕落者、偽の神々の哀れな手先、腐敗と臆病の異端者どもの肉より、石を飲み込んだ方がましだ…」{n}ウルファーは、フェンリスの言葉で冒涜的な暴言を吐く。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar schnaubt verächtlich und spuckt auf den Boden.{/n} "Würde ich meinen Hunger stillen wollen, würde ich eher Steine schlucken als das Fleisch dieser jämmerlichen Degenerierten, dieser erbärmlichen Schergen der falschen Götter, dieser ketzerischen, verderbten, feigen Würmer ..." {n}Ulfars Grollen erhebt sich zu einer wahren Schimpftirade auf Fenrisisch.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar snorts contemptuously and spits on the ground.{/n} "If I wanted to sate my hunger, I would sooner swallow rocks than the meat of these lousy degenerates, these pathetic minions of the false gods, these heretical sacks of corruption and cowardice..." {n}Ulfar's rumbling rises to a profanity-filled tirade in Fenrisian.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar schnaubt verächtlich und spuckt auf den Boden.{/n} "Würde ich meinen Hunger stillen wollen, würde ich eher Steine schlucken als das Fleisch dieser jämmerlichen Degenerierten, dieser erbärmlichen Schergen der falschen Götter, dieser ketzerischen, verderbten, feigen Würmer ..." {n}Ulfars Grollen erhebt sich zu einer wahren Schimpftirade auf Fenrisisch.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar renifle bruyamment et crache par terre.{/n} « Si je voulais satisfaire ma faim, je préférerais avaler des cailloux plutôt que la chair de ces pauvres dégénérés, ces minables pantins des faux dieux, ces hérétiques lâches et corrompus... » {n}Les grondements d'Ulfar se muent en une flopée d'insultes en fenrissien.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar snorts contemptuously and spits on the ground.{/n} "If I wanted to sate my hunger, I would sooner swallow rocks than the meat of these lousy degenerates, these pathetic minions of the false gods, these heretical sacks of corruption and cowardice..." {n}Ulfar's rumbling rises to a profanity-filled tirade in Fenrisian.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar renifle bruyamment et crache par terre.{/n} « Si je voulais satisfaire ma faim, je préférerais avaler des cailloux plutôt que la chair de ces pauvres dégénérés, ces minables pantins des faux dieux, ces hérétiques lâches et corrompus... » {n}Les grondements d'Ulfar se muent en une flopée d'insultes en fenrissien.{/n}

languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar snorts contemptuously and spits on the ground.{/n} "If I wanted to sate my hunger, I would sooner swallow rocks than the meat of these lousy degenerates, these pathetic minions of the false gods, these heretical sacks of corruption and cowardice..." {n}Ulfar's rumbling rises to a profanity-filled tirade in Fenrisian.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, kibirle homurdanıp yere tükürüyor.{/n} "Açlığımı dindirmek istesem bile bu rezil soysuzların, sahte tanrıların acınası kölelerinin, yoz ve korkak kâfirlerin etini yemektense taş yutarım daha iyi..." {n}Ulfar'ın gürlemesi; küfür dolu, Fenrisçe bir tirada dönüşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar snorts contemptuously and spits on the ground.{/n} "If I wanted to sate my hunger, I would sooner swallow rocks than the meat of these lousy degenerates, these pathetic minions of the false gods, these heretical sacks of corruption and cowardice..." {n}Ulfar's rumbling rises to a profanity-filled tirade in Fenrisian.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar kibirle homurdanıyor ve yere tükürüyor.{/n} "Açlığımı dindirmek istesem bile bu rezil soysuzların, sahte tanrıların acınası kölelerinin, kâfir yozlaşma ve korkaklık yığınların etini yemektense taş yutarım daha iyi..." {n}Ulfar'ın gürlemesi, küfürle dolu bir Fenrisce tirada dönüşüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
